entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 09 February 2023
